paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a likely pathogenic variant in the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Interestingly, WES also revealed a mutation in KCNH2 associated with LQTS type 2.

individual_records.phenotype_details: normal echocardiogram and EKG analyses, never hospitalized
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Serial echocardiogram and EKG analyses have been normal, and she has never been hospitalized.

functional_data.summary: The mutation in KCNH2 is associated with increased risk of sudden cardiac death.

variants.segregation_data: The KCNH2 mutation was paternally inherited.
variants.additional_notes: The patient had a family history of sudden death and sensorineural hearing loss.
key_quotes: Interestingly, WES also revealed a mutation in KCNH2 associated with LQTS type 2.
Although, we have no evidence of long QT in our patient, individuals with mutations in KCNH2 are at increased risk of sudden cardiac death.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the KCNH2 variant was extracted successfully.
